name: SnowSwap
intro: Stablecoin exchange protocol with low slippage
introduce: SnowSwap is designed for low slippage stablecoin swaps and is based originally on Curve’s AMM. Our first pool for yVault stablecoins, allowed traders to easily swap between different yEarn V1 vaults without paying withdrawal fees and to exit positions cheaply by swapping into vaults with sufficiently large token reserves and then withdrawing.
